name: Template construct 2 - Button Football
description:
Description 

This is a button football game template, made in Construct 2.
It is for 2 players, in turn game. Who wins the most goals in the time of the timekeeper.

Button Soccer is a HTML5 Construct 2 Game. It is a casual two players game, with touch-based game play (local multiplayer), lets go to do goal. 

Demo: Button Soccer

Orientrations - Landscape Layout size - 854x480

Plugins: - Touch - Audio - Function - Browser

 Features 

- Splash - Menu - Credits - Game play - Touch moviment - Turn game - Timer - Game over

 

Assets 

This template uses Kenney assets (audio, graphics). See more at kenney.nl. The assets folder included in the project has some modified ones and their originals.

License - All Kenney assets are CC0 License: (CC0 1.0 Universal) You're free to use these game assets in any project, personal or commercial. There's no need to ask permission before using these. Giving attribution is not required, but is greatly appreciated!

Assets used (free):  Art - Kenney.nl Audio - Kenney.nl

Files: CAPX , Readme
